title: you never really met a salty person, until you get closer to plat.
body:
you think you met someone who is salty in bronze/silver?   fuck noooooooooooo.  just wait til you climbing up to plat.  that people that i play with and are plat are hostile as fuck.  nothing but toxicity and name calling during games.   they think they are god because they were plat/diamond last season.  bitch that was last season.  get over yourself.

nonetheless, they AT LEAST know what they are doing.  bronze/silver games teams just run around trying to kill each other.  they literally just say fuck laning phase, fuck dragons, fuck baron. kill hungry.
